HomeMeta.title: Freelance Web Developer ‚Äì Fast & Custom Websites | Brice Eliasse
HomeMeta.description: Need an efficient and professional website? Brice Eliasse, freelance web developer, I create fast, beautiful, and easy-to-use websites.

BlogMeta.title: All my articles - Blog and News of a Freelance Web Developer | Brice Eliasse
BlogMeta.description: Browse all articles by Brice Eliasse, freelance web developer. Discover advice, news, and tips on web development.

Projects.heading1: Sorry but I really love to
Projects.intro: Here are some of my latest works, some are unfinished side projects, others are freelance client projects. Every project is coded solo and lives somewhere on my GitHub.
Projects.beatriceDesc: Beatrice generates and automatically publishes SEO articles for your Nextjs, Wordpress, etc. Connect your app, she takes care of the content.
Projects.beatriceWorkDone:
For Beatrice, I designed and implemented a complete system that automates the creation and publication of SEO content for Next.js projects.

I developed routes to manage the entire content lifecycle:

  • Article search and filtering with pagination
  • Generation of SEO-optimized articles (titles, meta descriptions, tags, FAQs)
  • Automatic creation of unique and optimized images
  • Secure update and deletion of content

I also integrated automatic image optimization and a CMS-like workflow to simplify management.

In summary, I built Beatrice as an autonomous SEO engine for developers ‚Äî combining content generation, media optimization, and automatic publishing in a Next.js environment.
Projects.beatriceMission: Beatrice is an AI that generates and automatically publishes SEO articles for your Nextjs, Wordpress, etc. Connect your app, she takes care of the content.

Projects.coursDesc: Future website to give online courses
Projects.fuchsDesc: Web game for All-images where participants must determine if an image displayed is a real photo or generated by AI.
Projects.kraiDesc: Site created to deepen my knowledge in Laravel and practice integration with Bootstrap with a Parallax effect.
Projects.legendsFusionDesc: Web game to build a League of Legends character by randomly combining the skills of chosen characters.
Projects.mvpDesc: Vanilla JS site to learn to use ChartJS. It scrapes OPGG data with Puppeteer, stores it and extracts information.
Projects.pokedexDesc: Project to train my students to use web services, integrate and program in Vanilla JS.
Projects.ronronnerieDesc: Website for a cat caf√© located in the center of Nice.
Projects.supdecoursDesc: Home-made CMS for course creation by teachers and online resource distribution for students.
Projects.quizbrainDesc: Exercises with Next14 and webservice for my students. The goal is to work with dynamic pages and SSR
Projects.trouveMotDesc: Free Laravel API for random words allowing you to retrieve words sorted or not by categories.
Projects.monacotraductionDesc: Multilingual website created for a translation agency based in Monaco.

Skills.frontendDesc: For users to interact intuitively and fluidly with my sites, my current stack is React with NextJS.
Skills.backendDesc: It's the engine that makes a site run. I work with Next, Node.js/Express.js, Laravel or even Wordpress in a headless way.
Skills.bddDesc: Allows data storage. I use MongoDB and MySQL by mapping my data with Mongoose or Eloquent for example.
Skills.uxuiDesc: I pay attention to the design of my apps. To integrate elegant and functional interfaces, I use Tailwind and DaisyUI.
Skills.cmsDesc: I sometimes use Wordpress or Shopify to simplify the site management by the client, ensuring easy and efficient take-over.
Skills.seoDesc: Site optimization for search engines. I optimize keywords, data structure, semantics and performance.
Skills.responsiveDesc: I adjust the content and visual elements of my sites to display them optimally on all types of devices.
Skills.performanceDesc: I develop ultra-performant websites using the latest technologies, optimizing SEO and ensuring excellent Lighthouse scores.
Skills.nativeAppDesc: I use React to create apps with React Native, which facilitates compatibility on iOS and Android while remaining performant.
Skills.gestionProjetDesc: Planning, budgeting, resource management and communication between team members and stakeholders.
Skills.pedagogieDesc: As a teacher in programming, I try to explain complex concepts as well as possible and always in a playful way.
Skills.humainDesc: I'm not a robot, I'm attentive and conciliatory to manage the unexpected, anticipate problems and propose my ideas.

Reviews.heading: If you still have doubts
Reviews.testimonials: I had the opportunity to work with Brice for a project at G2 Esports and I can only recommend his services: fast execution, qualitative and flexible!
Reviews.avis1: Having had the opportunity to work with Brice, he is an excellent developer and his second role as a trainer facilitates communication and information transfer in all projects. His talent for bringing a youthful touch
Reviews.avis2: I work with Brice Eliasse daily as a trainer, and I want to highlight his remarkable expertise in our field. Brice is not only a talented developer with a wide range of technical skills, but
Reviews.avis3: I had the pleasure of attending a training course given by Brice Eliasse as a trainer and web developer, and I am extremely satisfied with the experience. Brice brilliantly combines his in-depth technical expertise with an approach
Reviews.avis4: Experienced trainer! Brice is very pedagogical and makes himself available for his students. He knows how to adapt to his audience. I am very satisfied with his commitment during my training. His varied and in-depth skills on several technologies are highly appreciated. I highly recommend his services!
Reviews.avis5: As a designer, I have met many developers and I can tell you with certainty, Brice is the best! He is very professional, pedagogical and always striving for improvement. If you want to learn or have a project, he is the one you need!
Reviews.avis6: A huge thank you to Brice for your teaching and support in this experience. You were able to pass on your knowledge with clarity and passion
Reviews.avis7: As Director of the La Capsule Nice training center, I highly recommend Brice for his seriousness and his ability to lead web development training sessions.
Reviews.avis8: I was able to take a course with Brice to retrain in web development, pedagogical, patient and very invested, a pleasure to have learned from Brice, he was able to pass on all his knowledge to allow us to successfully obtain our diploma.
Reviews.avis9: Brice taught me web programming for 3 months and it was a very enriching experience. Thanks to his patience and pedagogy, I learned HTML/CSS, Javascript, React and the NextJs and ExpressJS frameworks quite easily. Today, thanks to his courses, I am a Full-stack developer in an agency in Nice üôè
Reviews.avis10: I was lucky to have Brice as a teacher at La Capsule, and I am completely satisfied with his teaching methodology. He was patient when I had trouble understanding and knew how to rephrase explanations so that I could clearly grasp them.
Reviews.avis11: A very good teacher, pedagogical and patient to teach and explain the basics of web development, with whom we had a lot of fun during these 3 months of training at La Capsule. Thank you Brice!!
Reviews.avis12: I had the pleasure of working with Brice. He is professional, serious and attentive. I would not hesitate to contact him again if needed!
Reviews.avis13: Professional, available and pedagogical, Brice has all the qualities and skills to teach you web development.
Reviews.avis14: Superb teacher attentive to his students, I really enjoyed these 10 weeks of dev training with Brice
Reviews.avis15: I couldn't do better than to highly recommend Brice for his skillful web design talents. Particularly efficient, he was attentive and able to give the necessary impetus to my site. It was a pleasure to collaborate with him.
Reviews.avis16: The perfection of a young and talented developer!
Reviews.avis17: After many projects carried out with Brice, I can testify that he always seeks to best satisfy your requests, through services that meet your expectations and at the fairest price.
Reviews.avis18: Dedicated person in his field, highly recommended!
Reviews.avis19: A pleasure to work alongside him. Talented, professional, attentive, versatile, and a portfolio that makes you want to work with him.
Reviews.avis20: Very good developer able to respond to your requests precisely and quickly.
Reviews.avis21: I was a student of Brice, he is passionate about his work, incredibly quick to find the right solutions, a born teacher, and delivers quality work in his designs. I recommend him 200%
Reviews.avis22: I attended a training course given by Brice, I was very well trained for the developer profession, he is very pedagogical and loves his job, it was felt throughout the training
Reviews.avis23: I had the opportunity to work with Brice for the G2 Esports project and I can only recommend his services: fast, qualitative and flexible execution!

Home.heroFirst: Freelance web developer based in Nice with
Home.heroSecond: to build the website or app you dream of.
Home.heroBadge: What if we 100% automated your Blog? ‚Üí
Home.CTABannerTitle: Ready to build something that works & stands out?
Home.CTABannerSubtitle: Let‚Äôs build websites and apps that look great, perform flawlessly, and drive real growth for your business.
Home.aboutAge: I'm a Freelance web developer from France, currently
Home.aboutAge2: years old. I'm curious, creative and <underline>precise</underline>.
Home.aboutParagraph1: After a Master‚Äôs degree in development with work-study across startups, SMEs and large companies, I built solid experience in web development. Being versatile, I naturally became a freelance web developer. I also teach in higher education and bootcamps.
Home.aboutQuote: Coding is giving life to ideas, mine or someone else‚Äôs.
Home.careerSub: Thanks to all the companies that trusted me ‚Üì
Home.projectsIntro: Here are some of my latest works‚Äîsome are unfinished side projects, others are freelance client projects. Every project is coded solo and lives somewhere on my GitHub.
Home.toolsIntro: I follow a ship first mindset‚Äîlaunch fast, iterate faster. I use a modern toolset that covers an entire project end-to-end so I can turn ideas into secure, production-ready products quickly.
